text: The numismatic series Wealth and Pride of Peru ("Riqueza y Orgullo del Perú" in Spanish) were minted by the Central Reserve Bank of Peru with the aim of promoting a numismatic culture and disseminate the cultural heritage of Peru. Each coin depicts a department of Peru, showing a tourist attraction in the region.NUMISMATIC SERIES "WEALTH AND PRIDE OF PERU" - Central Reserve Bank of Peru All coins in the series have the denomination of One Nuevo Sol/Sol and are legal tender throughout the country.
